ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
SubjectOrder (1) terminating the assignment of the Honourable Jane Philpott; (2) assigning the Honourable Seamus Thomas Harris Oâ€™Regan to assist the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development and; (3) assigning the Honourable Bernadette Jordan to assist the Minister of Industry and the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities.
PrecisOrder (1) terminating the assignment of the Honourable Jane Philpott, made by Order in Council P.C. 2017-1106 of August 28, 2017; (2) assigning the Honourable Seamus Thomas Harris O'Regan, a minister of State styled Minister of Indigenous Services, to assist the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development; and (3) assigning the Honourable Bernadette Jordan, a minister of State styled Minister of Rural Economic Development, to assist the Minister of Industry and the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities.
AttachmentsAttachment
